short_summary: Request for Standing Offer (Regional Individual Standing Offer) for transportation services
description: Provide transportation services for the Department of National Defense (DND) in Brandon, Manitoba.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Notification**
### Transportation Services for CFB Shilo

**Reference:** WS4222197718

**Publication Date:** 03 November 2023

**Tender Closing Date and Time:** 15 November 2023 at 14:00:00 HNE

**Brief Description:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites offers from qualified suppliers to provide transportation services for military personnel, residents, and employees of CFB Shilo, located within a 40 km radius of Brandon, Manitoba. The proposed services will include:

* Scheduled pickup and drop-off at designated points
* Unscheduled runs as required and available

**Key Requirements:**

* Contractor must have a comprehensive and progressive agreement for trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Successful provider will be awarded a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for a period of approximately 11 months

**Notice URL:**

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17913752?extsite=MTc5MTM3NTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**How to Submit a Bid:**

Please submit a bid electronically through the Ariba Discovery platform by the specified closing date and time.

**Requirement Details:**

* Mandatory requirements: Transportation services for the period of 11 months
* Pickup and drop-off services to be provided to designated points within a 40 km radius of CFB Shilo
* Unscheduled runs to be determined on an as- required basis

**Delivery Location:** CFB Shilo, Brandon Manitoba

**Contracting Entity:**

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
Contact: Wiebe, Lyland (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Please make sure to clearly indicate your intention to submit a bid with your tender response. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to receiving your bid.  Alberta PNP invitation letter is a standard way of getting Eoi for Eoi nominated candidates.
